panels.title: Welcome to Interlake Scioly!
panels.text: We compete in science and engineering events at the local, regional, state, and national levels! See soinc.org and scioly.org for more information. We meet on Mondays from 3:30-4:00 in room 1708. Come join us :)

panels.title: Contact Us
panels.text: Join our Facebook group at Interlake Science Olympiad. If you have questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out to us at interlakescienceolympiad@gmail.com.

panels.title: Event Category: Life, Personal & Social Science
Event Category: Earth and Space Science
Event Category: Inquiry & Nature of Science
Second Meeting on 10/7 at 3:30
panels.text: This is a reminder that there will be a meeting Monday, October 7 from 3:40-4:10 in Room 1708. We will be going over basic event introductions, team structures, tryouts, and some other information. See you there!

panels.title: First Meeting!
panels.text: The first Scioly meeting this year will be Monday, September 30 from 3:30-4:00 in room 1708. To dispel any misinformation that has been floating around: We will be meeting on Mondays throughout the year. We will always announce in advance if there will be a meeting on any given week. Generally, we don’t default to meeting every single week. We’re looking forward to a fantastic year! See you at the information meeting!!!
